characterDescription:
Vedekar Perel was a lighteyed officer in Sebarial's army who was brutally murdered in the tower at Urithiru by the Unmade, Re-Shephir.
His body was discovered by a scouting party (i.e., members of Bridge Four) in a remote part of the tower's second level. Lyn reported this to Dalinar.

characterDetails.Notes: Several people - including Navani and Shallan - assumed that the same individual killed both Sadeas and Vedekar.
